notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: L.D. and N.D. proposed the research and did the project planning. A.C. provided the samples. E.B., A.C., and M.B. selected the single crystals. A.C., E.B., M.B., and L.D. prepared the high-pressure experiments. E.B., M.B., A.C., L.D., H.-P.L., M.H., V.P., and C.P., conducted single-crystal X-ray diffraction experiments. E.B. and M.B. analyzed the single-crystal X-ray diffraction data. I.A.A. planned and supervised theoretical calculations. J.T., O.H., S.I.S., M.Be., and I.A.A. conducted ab initio calculations. E.B., M.B., L.D., N.D., and I.A.A. interpreted the results. E.B. and L.D. wrote the paper with contributions of all authors.
